name: Live Music Concert
description: Live music event with mobile phone and line level audio

shot_types.name: leadWide_Mid
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the middle of the frame, head to foot.

shot_types.name: leadWide_Right
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the right of the frame, head to foot.

shot_types.name: leadWide_Left
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the left of the frame, head to foot.

shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the middle of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: leadMedium_Right
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the right of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: leadMedium_Left
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the left of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: leadCloseup_Mid
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the middle of the frame. Make their face fill the screen.

shot_types.name: leadCloseup_Right
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the right of the frame. Make their face fill the screen.

shot_types.name: leadCloseup_Left
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the left of the frame. Make their face fill the screen.

shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the middle of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: musicianMedium_Right
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the right of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: musicianMedium_Left
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the left of the frame, head to waist.

shot_types.name: musicianMCloseup_Mid
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the middle of the frame. Make their face fill the screen.

shot_types.name: musicianMCloseup_Right
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the right of the frame. Make their face fill the screen..

shot_types.name: musicianMCloseup_Left
shot_types.description: Place %%replaceme%% in the left of the frame. Make their face fill the screen.

shot_types.name: detailCloseup_1
shot_types.description: Shoot several shots of details: get closeups of microphones and cables.

shot_types.name: detailCloseup_2
shot_types.description: Shoot several shots of details: get closeups of hands on instruments.

shot_types.name: detailCloseup_3
shot_types.description: Shoot several shots of details: get closeups of a musician's feet moving.

shot_types.name: detailCloseup_4
shot_types.description: Shoot several shots of details: get closeups of the lights or projections.

shot_types.name: bandWide_1
shot_types.description: Fit the whole band in. From straight ahead, get them as large on the screen as you can.

shot_types.name: venueExterior_1
shot_types.description: Cover the exterior of the venue, with audience members arriving.

shot_types.name: detailRigging_1
shot_types.description: Shoot some pre-show footage of technicians rigging the stage.

shot_types.name: stageWide_1
shot_types.description: Frame the whole stage and include the heads of the audience for atmosphere.

shot_types.name: bandAudienceWide_1
shot_types.description: Cover the whole band and include the heads of the audience.

shot_types.name: audienceWide_1
shot_types.description: Turn away from the stage and get some shots of the audience.

shot_types.name: audienceCloseup_1
shot_types.description: Turn away from the stage and point your camera at an audience member. Fill the screen with their face.

shot_types.name: venueWide_1
shot_types.description: Move as far back and high up as you can (safely!) Get the whole stage and as much of the venue in as you can.

shot_types.name: leadPanDown_Mid
shot_types.description: Make %%replaceme%%'s face fill the middle of the frame. Pan slowly down to their hands and back.

shot_types.name: leadPanDown_Right
shot_types.description: Make %%replaceme%%'s face fill the right of the frame. Pan slowly down to their hands and back.

shot_types.name: leadPanDown_Left
shot_types.description: Make %%replaceme%%'s face fill the left of the frame. Pan slowly down to their hands and back.

shot_types.name: musicianPanDown_Left
shot_types.description: Make %%replaceme%%'s face fill the left of the frame. Pan slowly down to their hands and back.
